mapper.insert: insert into bookorder(accountId, roomTypeId,name, idCard ,phoneNum, status, arriveDate, leaveDate, createTime, remark) values(#{accountId},#{roomTypeId},#{name},#{idCard},#{phoneNum},#{status},#{arriveDate},#{leaveDate},#{createTime},#{remark});
mapper.update: update bookorder set accountId=#{accountId},roomTypeId=#{roomTypeId}, name=#{name},idCard=#{idCard}, phoneNum=#{phoneNum},status =#{status},arriveDate =#{arriveDate},leaveDate =#{leaveDate},remark =#{remark} where id=#{id}
